alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:40PM EDT until April 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek At Kast Bridge. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The river begins to overflow into low lying RV parks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 6.1 feet. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 5.3 feet. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.1 feet on 12/29/1984. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 pm: 5.5 Forecast: Fri 2 am 6.1 Fri 8 am 6.0 Fri 2 pm 5.6 Fri 8 pm 5.3 Sat 2 am 5.3 Sat 8 am 5.5 Sat 2 pm 5.5 Sat 8 pm 5.4 Sun 2 am 5.3 Sun 8 am 5.2 Sun 2 pm 5.0 &&
